gw.api.webservice.systemTools

Class SystemRunlevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.pl.util.webservices.GWEnumeration
      • gw.api.webservice.systemTools.SystemRunlevel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GWRemotable, java.io.Serializable

    public final class SystemRunlevel
extends GWEnumeration
implements java.io.Serializable
    Defines the runlevels that the system can be at or set to.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static SystemRunlevel DAEMONS
      Run level in which the server is running but users will not be able to login to the server.
      static SystemRunlevel MAINTENANCE
      Run level in which the server is running but users will not be able to login to the server.
      static SystemRunlevel MULTIUSER
      Run level in which the server is running normally.
      static SystemRunlevel STARTING
      Server is currently starting

    • Field Detail

      • STARTING

        public static final SystemRunlevel STARTING
        Server is currently starting

      • MAINTENANCE

        public static final SystemRunlevel MAINTENANCE
        Run level in which the server is running but users will not be able to login to the server. Background processes, e.g. batch processes, are not running.

      • DAEMONS

        public static final SystemRunlevel DAEMONS
        Run level in which the server is running but users will not be able to login to the server. Background processes, e.g. batch processes, can run in this run level.

      • MULTIUSER

        public static final SystemRunlevel MULTIUSER
        Run level in which the server is running normally.
